## Registration Dates

<hr>

Registration for the workshop will start from January 5, 2026.

<br>

## Registration Process

<hr>

Registration for the conference and short course will start from January 5, 2026. More information will be shared shortly.

**Conference Registration fees:** £50

**Short course registration fees** (further details about the course can be found [here](https://admtp.github.io/ADMTP2026/course.html))
<ul>
  <li> Registration Fees for a single course: £175   </li>
  <li> Registration Fees for both courses: £300   </li>
</ul>

<br>


## Contact Information

<hr>

If you have any questions or need further assistance regarding registration, please contact us at [aritra.mukherjee@newcastle.ac.uk](mailto:aritra.mukherjee@newcastle.ac.uk).

We look forward to welcoming you to the conference!
